page.title: 17A NORMAL SCHOOL DAY IN B.H.
page.content: I wake up in the morning & open the curtains, & get dressed. I go down stairs & have my breakfast, which is usually Frosties. I have to make a packed lunch for my brother . I then go out & feed my 36 fish ,kept in a pond, & my two rabbits. I brush my hair & then I wait for for my friend to come and knock for me. We then go to another friends house, she spends a long time getting ready. That is why we are usually late for school. We usually arrive at school at9-15 a.m. & go into registration this finishes at 9-30. We have Technical Drawing in the morning, then a break at 10.40. At 11.00 we go back to T.D. till 12.10. I usually walk home to lunch with a friend & we come back at 1.15. We have registration till 1.25 then Biology till 2.35. Next we have Geography till we go home at 3.50. to do my homework.
